title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning July 24, 2023, that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we ask whether board directors are getting the information they need to oversee cyber risk in plain English. Plus: the importance of making sure that procurement understands its role in cybersecurity; the takeaways on how the Securities and Exchange Commission is approaching enforcement around cybersecurity; and why the cause of the next large incident is more likely to be human error than cyber criminals.

title: America's Toxic Lead Cable Problem

On July 27, at 1 p.m. ET, the Journal’s Investigations Editor Michael Siconolfi speaks with investigative journalists Shalini Ramachandran and John West about their deep-dive into America’s lead cable problem.
